documentation.text: @dev Add a revoked credential to the registry
@dev Check if a credential is revoked
@dev Get total number of revoked credentials
@dev Authorize a contract to add revocations
@dev Check if a contract is authorized

devdoc.details: Tracks revoked credentials for verification purposes Provides a centralized registry of all revoked credential IDs

Paused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`.

Unpaused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

addRevocation(uint256,address,address,st.details: Add a revoked credential to the registry

authorizeContract(address).details: Authorize a contract to add revocations

getTotalRevoked().details: Get total number of revoked credentials

isAuthorized(address).details: Check if a contract is authorized

isRevoked(uint256).details: Check if a credential is revoked

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: RevocationRegistry
